mapper.select: select p.product_name, p.customer_requirement, fdp.* from product p join fixed_deposit_product fdp on fdp.product_id=p.product_id where p.product_type='fixed_deposit' and p.product_status='active';
select p.product_name, p.customer_requirement, dp.* from product p join deposit_product dp on dp.product_id=p.product_id where p.product_type='deposit' and p.product_status='active';

select p.product_name, p.customer_requirement, cap.* from product p join checking_account_product cap on cap.product_id=p.product_id where p.product_type='checking_account' and p.product_status='active';
select p.product_name, p.customer_requirement, lp.* from product p join loan_product lp on lp.product_id=p.product_id where p.product_type='loan' and p.product_status='active';
select p.product_name, p.customer_requirement, cp.* from product p join card_product cp on cp.product_id=p.product_id where p.product_type='card' and p.product_status='active';
